select tct.*,tat.V_APP_NAME from t_commission_tab tct left join t_app_tab tat on tct.V_APP_ID = tat.ID
AND tat.V_USER_ID = #{USER_ID}
AND tat.V_APP_NAME like CONCAT('%', #{V_APP_NAME}, '%')
order by tct.V_COMMISSION_TIME desc

SELECT sum(tct.V_MONEY) V_MONEY, SUM(tct.V_REALITY) V_REALITY, SUM(tct.V_FORMALITIES) V_FORMALITIES, (sum(tct.V_MONEY)- SUM(tct.V_REALITY)) RATE_MONEY, tct.V_APP_ID, tat.V_APP_NAME FROM t_commission_tab tct left join t_app_tab tat on tct.V_APP_ID = tat.ID
AND TO_DAYS(tct.V_COMMISSION_TIME) = TO_DAYS(now()) AND tct.V_STATUS = '1'
GROUP BY tct.V_APP_ID

SELECT tct.V_MONEY, tct.V_REALITY V_REALITY, tct.V_FORMALITIES V_FORMALITIES, tct.V_APP_ID, tat.V_APP_NAME FROM t_commission_tab tct left join t_app_tab tat on tct.V_APP_ID = tat.ID
AND TO_DAYS(tct.V_COMMISSION_TIME) = TO_DAYS(now()) AND tct.V_STATUS = '1'
AND tat.V_APP_NAME like CONCAT('%', #{V_APP_NAME}, '%')
